zone_id.description: The zone id of the zone to create the record in

name.description: The name of the record to create

type.description: The type of the record to create

ttl.description: The TTL of the record to create. Required for non-alias records

records.description: The records to create. Required for non-alias records

set_identifier.description: The set identifier of the record to create

allow_overwrite.description: Whether to allow overwriting an existing record

health_check_id.description: The health check id to associate with the record

multivalue_answer_routing_policy.description: The routing policy for selecting a record from the list of records

alias.description: The alias block for the record. Conflicts with ttl and records
alias.type: list(object({name: string, zone_id: string, evaluate_target_health: bool}))

geolocation_routing_policy.description: The geolocation routing policy for the record
geolocation_routing_policy.type: list(object({continent: string, country: string, subdivision: string}))
